statements: SELECT * FROM order_confirmations
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM order_confirmations
SELECT customer_id, order_id, total_amount FROM order_confirmations WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM order_confirmations ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM order_confirmations GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_confirmations WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM order_confirmations WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM order_confirmations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM order_confirmations WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY total_amount ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM order_confirmations GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, customer_id FROM orders JOIN invoices ON orders.order_id = invoices.order_id WHERE invoices.invoice_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, invoice_date, invoice_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, invoices.invoice_amount FROM orders JOIN invoices ON orders.order_id = invoices.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders LEFT JOIN invoices ON orders.order_id = invoices.order_id WHERE invoices.invoice_amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order_Confirmations ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Order_Confirmations ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, email, invoice_date, total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Order_Confirmations o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Invoices i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Order_Items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, invoice_date FROM Invoice ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT oi.product_id, oi.quantity, o.order_date FROM Order_Items oi JOIN Order o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, subtotal FROM OrderItems WHERE quantity <= 3;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_date, amount_due FROM Customers INNER JOIN Invoices ON Customers.customer_id = Invoices.customer_id;
